subject: Citi Field (NYC)
Brick and Tile
lead_paragraph: Mets fans spent hundreds of dollars to have their devotion to the team etched into the 18,000 bricks in front of the main entrance to Citi Field.
snippet: Mets fans spent hundreds of dollars to have their devotion to the team etched into the 18,000 bricks in front of the main entrance to Citi Field.
